title: The Skeleton. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Studies the relationship of speed of movement of the exoskeleton/endoskeleton of animals. Focuses on the human skeleton, showing the various parts and indicating the muscle contractions that lead to skeleton movement. Also indicates the physical and chemical structure of bone and provides an illustration of the strength of hollow bone compared with solid bone. Suitable for upper secondary level.
